amendatorysection.chaptername: State University, State Colleges, and Postsecondary Education
amendatorysection.catchline: American Sign Language course; credits; how used.
amendatorysection.para: Any postsecondary educational institution may offer an elective course in American Sign Language. Any credits earned in a course in American Sign Language at a postsecondary educational institution may be used for world language credits if recognized as such by the postsecondary educational institution.
